item.title: GSK
item.description: score:-20 Chances: GSK’s value is being questioned, but it may be undervalued, making it an attractive investment option. GSK announces availability of AREXVY, its Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) vaccine, at all major US retail pharmacies. Settling the first Zantac cancer lawsuit could soothe investors and impact GSK’s stock positively.
